body:
you'll see why this is in Off Topic as you read this

although i am leaving for good since i feel no place on it

here's a problem I got: i cannot get on Discord even though i clicked on the link and put in the code, i was supposed to be unbanned like 24 hours ago

what am i do now? i dunno

people i will miss:

{tag=58b9ab0f83cf43c1b53baecd64ed2838} I've known this guy since him being jr mod which is neat

{tag=b06b0fd9e19046478ed1cfe679a3d434} i think this is the right tag if right, he was the first person to welcome me back on the server

shadow i dunno your tag and im lazy so, i will miss you as a moderator and i feel like snow should've been demoted as the same as ya'll (no offense snow)

{tag=fb57ed989f4140c78e61dee46d34d427} remember me as the guy who flamed on #politics with you

{tag=02096be10c14490aac69b84de30cce84} congrats on the job i wish you the best

{tag=c2a4c847653e482ab62ed7f8b64330cb} now you, although i hated a TON of the decisions that you've made for the server I respect you as an owner and nothing more than that

thought i'd add that last part

i'll miss you all

here's a problem I got: i cannot get on Discord even though i clicked on the link and put in the code, i was supposed to be unbanned like 24 hours ago

what am i do now? i dunno

people i will miss:

twopump I've known this guy since him being jr mod which is neat

_Wapa i think this is the right tag if right, he was the first person to welcome me back on the server

shadow i dunno your tag and im lazy so, i will miss you as a moderator and i feel like snow should've been demoted as the same as ya'll (no offense snow)

AtditC remember me as the guy who flamed on #politics with you

vladthegreat100 congrats on the job i wish you the best

ALM now you, although i hated a TON of the decisions that you've made for the server I respect you as an owner and nothing more than that

thought i'd add that last part

i'll miss you all
title: Why, Avicus why? {leaving}

replies.body:
yeah i was supposed to be unbanned from discord too but i guess they actually listened to what i wrote in my appeal and banned me forever like they said they wouldn't
take that, distraction and other guy

Gonna miss ya Cow. You're a cool dude!
Hope to talk to ya soon buddy, pal, chum!
